verses.kjv: Again the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: Again LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me again:

verses.kjv: Son of man, cause Jerusalem to know her abominations,
verses.web: “Son of man, cause Jerusalem to know her abominations;
verses.ct: "Son of man, confront Jerusalem with her disgusting sins

verses.kjv: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD unto Jerusalem; Thy birth and thy nativity is of the land of Canaan; thy father was an Amorite, and thy mother an Hittite.
verses.web: and say, ‘The Lord LORD says to Jerusalem: “Your origin and your birth is of the land of the Canaanite. An Amorite was your father, and your mother was a Hittite.
verses.ct: and say, 'This is what the Lord GOD says to Jerusalem: Your roots and your birth trace back to the land of Canaan. Your father was an Amorite and your mother was a Hittite.

verses.kjv: And as for thy nativity, in the day thou wast born thy navel was not cut, neither wast thou washed in water to supple thee; thou wast not salted at all, nor swaddled at all.
verses.web: As for your birth, in the day you were born your navel was not cut. You weren’t washed in water to cleanse you. You weren’t salted at all, nor wrapped in blankets at all.
verses.ct: On the day you were born, no one cut your umbilical cord. No one washed you with water to clean you off. No one rubbed you with salt or wrapped you in cloths.

verses.kjv: None eye pitied thee, to do any of these unto thee, to have compassion upon thee; but thou wast cast out in the open field, to the lothing of thy person, in the day that thou wast born.
verses.web: No eye pitied you, to do any of these things to you, to have compassion on you; but you were cast out in the open field, because you were abhorred in the day that you were born.
verses.ct: No one felt sorry enough for you to do any of these things. No one showed you any compassion. Instead, you were thrown out into an open field because you were despised on the day you were born.

verses.kjv: And when I passed by thee, and saw thee polluted in thine own blood, I said unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, Live; yea, I said unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, Live.
verses.web: “ ‘ “When I passed by you, and saw you wallowing in your blood, I said to you, ‘Though you are in your blood, live!’ Yes, I said to you, ‘Though you are in your blood, live!’
verses.ct: But then I passed by and saw you lying there, kicking in your own blood. I said to you as you lay in your blood, "Live!" Yes, I said to you, "Live!"

verses.kjv: I have caused thee to multiply as the bud of the field, and thou hast increased and waxen great, and thou art come to excellent ornaments: thy breasts are fashioned, and thine hair is grown, whereas thou wast naked and bare.
verses.web: I caused you to multiply as that which grows in the field, and you increased and grew great, and you attained to excellent ornament. Your breasts were formed, and your hair grew; yet you were naked and bare.
verses.ct: I made you grow and flourish like a plant in the field. You grew up and matured into a beautiful young woman. Your body developed and your hair grew long, but you were still naked and exposed.

verses.kjv: Now when I passed by thee, and looked upon thee, behold, thy time was the time of love; and I spread my skirt over thee, and covered thy nakedness: yea, I sware unto thee, and entered into a covenant with thee, saith the Lord GOD, and thou becamest mine.
verses.web: “ ‘ “Now when I passed by you, and looked at you, behold, your time was the time of love; and I spread my skirt over you, and covered your nakedness. Yes, I swore to you, and entered into a covenant with you,” says the Lord LORD, “and you became mine.
verses.ct: Later I passed by you again and looked at you, and you had reached the age for love. So I spread the edge of my garment over you and covered your nakedness. I made a vow to you and entered into a covenant with you," declares the Lord GOD, "and you became mine.

verses.kjv: Then washed I thee with water; yea, I throughly washed away thy blood from thee, and I anointed thee with oil.
verses.web: “ ‘ “Then washed I you with water. Yes, I thoroughly washed away your blood from you, and I anointed you with oil.
verses.ct: I bathed you with water and thoroughly washed the blood from your skin. Then I anointed you with oil.

verses.kjv: I clothed thee also with broidered work, and shod thee with badgers’ skin, and I girded thee about with fine linen, and I covered thee with silk.
verses.web: I clothed you also with embroidered work, and put sealskin sandals on you. I dressed you with fine linen and covered you with silk.
verses.ct: I dressed you in embroidered clothing and gave you sandals of fine leather. I wrapped you in linen and covered you with silk.

verses.kjv: I decked thee also with ornaments, and I put bracelets upon thy hands, and a chain on thy neck.
verses.web: I decked you with ornaments, put bracelets on your hands, and put a chain on your neck.
verses.ct: I adorned you with jewelry — bracelets on your wrists and a chain around your neck.

verses.kjv: And I put a jewel on thy forehead, and earrings in thine ears, and a beautiful crown upon thine head.
verses.web: I put a ring on your nose, and earrings in your ears, and a beautiful crown on your head.
verses.ct: I put a ring in your nose, earrings on your ears, and a beautiful crown on your head.

verses.kjv: Thus wast thou decked with gold and silver; and thy raiment was of fine linen, and silk, and broidered work; thou didst eat fine flour, and honey, and oil: and thou wast exceeding beautiful, and thou didst prosper into a kingdom.
verses.web: Thus you were decked with gold and silver. Your clothing was of fine linen, silk, and embroidered work. You ate fine flour, honey, and oil. You were exceedingly beautiful, and you prospered to royal estate.
verses.ct: You were decorated with gold and silver. Your clothes were made of fine linen, silk, and embroidered fabric. You ate the finest flour, honey, and oil. You became extraordinarily beautiful and rose to the status of a queen.

verses.kjv: And thy renown went forth among the heathen for thy beauty: for it was perfect through my comeliness, which I had put upon thee, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: Your renown went out among the nations for your beauty; for it was perfect, through my majesty which I had put on you,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: Your fame spread among the nations because of your beauty, which was perfect — because the splendor I gave you made it so," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: But thou didst trust in thine own beauty, and playedst the harlot because of thy renown, and pouredst out thy fornications on every one that passed by; his it was.
verses.web: “ ‘ “But you trusted in your beauty, and played the prostitute because of your renown, and poured out your prostitution on everyone who passed by. It was his.
verses.ct: But you trusted in your own beauty and used your fame to become a prostitute. You threw yourself at every man who passed by, giving yourself to anyone who wanted you.

verses.kjv: And of thy garments thou didst take, and deckedst thy high places with divers colours, and playedst the harlot thereupon: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.
verses.web: You took some of your garments, and made for yourselves high places decked with various colors, and played the prostitute on them. This shall not happen, neither shall it be.
verses.ct: You took some of your garments and decorated your pagan shrines with colorful fabrics, and you prostituted yourself on them. Such things should never have happened — and never should again.

verses.kjv: Thou hast also taken thy fair jewels of my gold and of my silver, which I had given thee, and madest to thyself images of men, and didst commit whoredom with them,
verses.web: You also took your beautiful jewels of my gold and of my silver, which I had given you, and made for yourself images of men, and played the prostitute with them.
verses.ct: You also took the beautiful gold and silver jewelry I had given you and made male idols out of them, and you committed prostitution with those images.

verses.kjv: And tookest thy broidered garments, and coveredst them: and thou hast set mine oil and mine incense before them.
verses.web: You took your embroidered garments, covered them, and set my oil and my incense before them.
verses.ct: You took your embroidered garments and draped them over the idols. You set my oil and my incense before them as offerings.

verses.kjv: My meat also which I gave thee, fine flour, and oil, and honey, wherewith I fed thee, thou hast even set it before them for a sweet savour: and thus it was, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: My bread also which I gave you, fine flour, oil, and honey, with which I fed you, you even set it before them for a pleasant aroma; and so it was,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: The food I gave you — the fine flour, oil, and honey I provided to nourish you — you offered it all before them as a pleasing aroma. That is exactly what happened," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: Moreover thou hast taken thy sons and thy daughters, whom thou hast borne unto me, and these hast thou sacrificed unto them to be devoured. Is this of thy whoredoms a small matter,
verses.web: “ ‘ “Moreover you have taken your sons and your daughters, whom you have borne to me, and you have sacrificed these to them to be devoured. Was your prostitution a small matter,
verses.ct: On top of all that, you took your sons and daughters — the children you bore to me — and sacrificed them to these idols to be consumed. Wasn't your prostitution bad enough?

verses.kjv: That thou hast slain my children, and delivered them to cause them to pass through the fire for them?
verses.web: that you have slain my children, and delivered them up, in causing them to pass through the fire to them?
verses.ct: Did you really have to slaughter my children and hand them over to be burned in the fire as offerings to idols?

verses.kjv: And in all thine abominations and thy whoredoms thou hast not remembered the days of thy youth, when thou wast naked and bare, and wast polluted in thy blood.
verses.web: In all your abominations and your prostitution you have not remembered the days of your youth, when you were naked and bare, and were wallowing in your blood.
verses.ct: Through all your disgusting sins and your prostitution, you never once remembered the days of your youth — when you were naked and exposed, kicking in your own blood.

verses.kjv: And it came to pass after all thy wickedness, (woe, woe unto thee! saith the LORD GOD;)
verses.web: “ ‘ “It has happened after all your wickedness. Woe, woe to you!” says the Lord LORD,
verses.ct: After all this wickedness — woe, woe to you!" declares the Lord GOD —

verses.kjv: That thou hast also built unto thee an eminent place, and hast made thee an high place in every street.
verses.web: “that you have built for yourselves a vaulted place, and have made yourselves a lofty place in every street.
verses.ct: you built yourself a pagan shrine and set up a high place on every street.

verses.kjv: Thou hast built thy high place at every head of the way, and hast made thy beauty to be abhorred, and hast opened thy feet to every one that passed by, and multiplied thy whoredoms.
verses.web: You have built your lofty place at the head of every way, and have made your beauty an abomination, and have opened your feet to everyone who passed by, and multiplied your prostitution.
verses.ct: At the entrance of every road you built your high places. You made your beauty into something disgusting by spreading your legs for everyone who passed by, multiplying your acts of prostitution.

verses.kjv: Thou hast also committed fornication with the Egyptians thy neighbours, great of flesh; and hast increased thy whoredoms, to provoke me to anger.
verses.web: You have also committed sexual immorality with the Egyptians, your neighbors, great of flesh; and have multiplied your prostitution, to provoke me to anger.
verses.ct: You prostituted yourself with the Egyptians, your lustful neighbors, and multiplied your acts of prostitution to provoke me to anger.

verses.kjv: Behold, therefore I have stretched out my hand over thee, and have diminished thine ordinary food, and delivered thee unto the will of them that hate thee, the daughters of the Philistines, which are ashamed of thy lewd way.
verses.web: See therefore, I have stretched out my hand over you, and have diminished your portion, and delivered you to the will of those who hate you, the daughters of the Philistines, who are ashamed of your lewd way.
verses.ct: So I struck back — I reached out my hand against you and cut your territory down. I handed you over to the will of those who hate you, the Philistine cities, who were themselves disgusted by your shameless behavior.

verses.kjv: Thou hast played the whore also with the Assyrians, because thou wast unsatiable; yea, thou hast played the harlot with them, and yet couldest not be satisfied.
verses.web: You have played the prostitute also with the Assyrians, because you were insatiable; yes, you have played the prostitute with them, and yet you weren’t satisfied.
verses.ct: Still not satisfied, you prostituted yourself with the Assyrians too. Even after that, you still weren't satisfied.

verses.kjv: Thou hast moreover multiplied thy fornication in the land of Canaan unto Chaldea; and yet thou wast not satisfied herewith.
verses.web: You have moreover multiplied your prostitution to the land of merchants, to Chaldea; and yet you weren’t satisfied with this.
verses.ct: You spread your prostitution even further — all the way to the merchant land of Chaldea — and still you weren't satisfied.

verses.kjv: How weak is thine heart, saith the LORD GOD, seeing thou doest all these things, the work of an imperious whorish woman;
verses.web: “ ‘ “How weak is your heart,” says the Lord LORD, “since you do all these things, the work of an impudent prostitute;
verses.ct: How sick is your heart," declares the Lord GOD, "that you do all these things — acting like a brazen, shameless prostitute!

verses.kjv: In that thou buildest thine eminent place in the head of every way, and makest thine high place in every street; and hast not been as an harlot, in that thou scornest hire;
verses.web: in that you build your vaulted place at the head of every way, and make your lofty place in every street, and have not been as a prostitute, in that you scorn pay.
verses.ct: You built your shrines at the entrance of every road and set up your high places on every street. Yet you weren't even like a normal prostitute, because you refused to take payment.

verses.kjv: But as a wife that committeth adultery, which taketh strangers instead of her husband!
verses.web: “ ‘ “A wife who commits adultery! Who takes strangers instead of her husband!
verses.ct: You are an adulterous wife who welcomes strangers into her bed instead of her own husband!

verses.kjv: They give gifts to all whores: but thou givest thy gifts to all thy lovers, and hirest them, that they may come unto thee on every side for thy whoredom.
verses.web: People give gifts to all prostitutes; but you give your gifts to all your lovers, and bribe them, that they may come to you on every side for your prostitution.
verses.ct: Every prostitute gets paid, but you? You gave gifts to all your lovers. You bribed them to come to you from every direction for your acts of prostitution.

verses.kjv: And the contrary is in thee from other women in thy whoredoms, whereas none followeth thee to commit whoredoms: and in that thou givest a reward, and no reward is given unto thee, therefore thou art contrary.
verses.web: You are different from other women in your prostitution, in that no one follows you to play the prostitute; and whereas you give hire, and no hire is given to you, therefore you are different.” ’
verses.ct: You are the opposite of every other prostitute. No one chased after you — you chased after them. You paid them instead of being paid. You did everything backward."

verses.kjv: Wherefore, O harlot, hear the word of the LORD:
verses.web: “Therefore, prostitute, hear LORD’s word:
verses.ct: So then, you prostitute, hear the word of the LORD!

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thy filthiness was poured out, and thy nakedness discovered through thy whoredoms with thy lovers, and with all the idols of thy abominations, and by the blood of thy children, which thou didst give unto them;
verses.web: ‘The Lord LORD says, “Because your filthiness was poured out, and your nakedness uncovered through your prostitution with your lovers; and because of all the idols of your abominations, and for the blood of your children, that you gave to them;
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: "Because you poured out your lust and exposed your nakedness through your prostitution with your lovers, and because of all your disgusting idols, and because of the blood of your children that you gave to them —

verses.kjv: Behold, therefore I will gather all thy lovers, with whom thou hast taken pleasure, and all them that thou hast loved, with all them that thou hast hated; I will even gather them round about against thee, and will discover thy nakedness unto them, that they may see all thy nakedness.
verses.web: therefore see, I will gather all your lovers, with whom you have taken pleasure, and all those who you have loved, with all those who you have hated. I will even gather them against you on every side, and will uncover your nakedness to them, that they may see all your nakedness.
verses.ct: I am going to gather all the lovers you enjoyed, everyone you loved and everyone you hated. I will gather them against you from every side and strip you naked in front of them so they can see you fully exposed.

verses.kjv: And I will judge thee, as women that break wedlock and shed blood are judged; and I will give thee blood in fury and jealousy.
verses.web: I will judge you, as women who break wedlock and shed blood are judged; and I will bring on you the blood of wrath and jealousy.
verses.ct: I will pass sentence on you the way an adulterous, murderous woman is sentenced. I will pour out my furious wrath and jealousy on you in blood.

verses.kjv: And I will also give thee into their hand, and they shall throw down thine eminent place, and shall break down thy high places: they shall strip thee also of thy clothes, and shall take thy fair jewels, and leave thee naked and bare.
verses.web: I will also give you into their hand, and they will throw down your vaulted place, and break down your lofty places. They will strip you of your clothes, and take your beautiful jewels. They will leave you naked and bare.
verses.ct: I will hand you over to your lovers, and they will tear down your shrines and demolish your high places. They will strip off your clothes, take your beautiful jewelry, and leave you naked and exposed.

verses.kjv: They shall also bring up a company against thee, and they shall stone thee with stones, and thrust thee through with their swords.
verses.web: They will also bring up a company against you, and they will stone you with stones, and thrust you through with their swords.
verses.ct: They will bring a mob against you, stone you to death, and cut you to pieces with their swords.

verses.kjv: And they shall burn thine houses with fire, and execute judgments upon thee in the sight of many women: and I will cause thee to cease from playing the harlot, and thou also shalt give no hire any more.
verses.web: They will burn your houses with fire, and execute judgments on you in the sight of many women. I will cause you to cease from playing the prostitute, and you will also give no hire any more.
verses.ct: They will burn your houses with fire and carry out judgment against you while many women watch. I will put an end to your prostitution, and you will never again pay your lovers.

verses.kjv: So will I make my fury toward thee to rest, and my jealousy shall depart from thee, and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry.
verses.web: So I will cause my wrath toward you to rest, and my jealousy will depart from you. I will be quiet, and will not be angry any more.
verses.ct: Then my fury against you will finally be spent. My jealousy will fade away, and I will be calm and no longer angry.

verses.kjv: Because thou hast not remembered the days of thy youth, but hast fretted me in all these things; behold, therefore I also will recompense thy way upon thine head, saith the Lord GOD: and thou shalt not commit this lewdness above all thine abominations.
verses.web: “ ‘ “Because you have not remembered the days of your youth, but have raged against me in all these things; therefore, behold, I also will bring your way on your head,” says the Lord LORD: “and you shall not commit this lewdness with all your abominations.
verses.ct: Because you did not remember the days of your youth but enraged me with all these things, I will bring the consequences of your behavior down on your own head," declares the Lord GOD. "Did you not pile this lewdness on top of all your other disgusting sins?

verses.kjv: Behold, every one that useth proverbs shall use this proverb against thee, saying, As is the mother, so is her daughter.
verses.web: “ ‘ “Behold, everyone who uses proverbs will use this proverb against you, saying, ‘As is the mother, so is her daughter.’
verses.ct: Everyone who quotes proverbs will say this about you: 'Like mother, like daughter.'

verses.kjv: Thou art thy mother’s daughter, that lotheth her husband and her children; and thou art the sister of thy sisters, which lothed their husbands and their children: your mother was an Hittite, and your father an Amorite.
verses.web: You are the daughter of your mother, who loathes her husband and her children; and you are the sister of your sisters, who loathed their husbands and their children. Your mother was a Hittite, and your father an Amorite.
verses.ct: You are truly your mother's daughter — she despised her husband and her children. You are truly your sisters' sister — they despised their husbands and their children. Your mother was a Hittite and your father was an Amorite.

verses.kjv: And thine elder sister is Samaria, she and her daughters that dwell at thy left hand: and thy younger sister, that dwelleth at thy right hand, is Sodom and her daughters.
verses.web: Your elder sister is Samaria, who dwells at your left hand, she and her daughters; and your younger sister, who dwells at your right hand, is Sodom with her daughters.
verses.ct: Your older sister is Samaria, who lives to your north with her surrounding towns. Your younger sister is Sodom, who lives to your south with her surrounding towns.

verses.kjv: Yet hast thou not walked after their ways, nor done after their abominations: but, as if that were a very little thing, thou wast corrupted more than they in all thy ways.
verses.web: Yet you have not walked in their ways, nor done their abominations; but soon you were more corrupt than they in all your ways.
verses.ct: You didn't just follow in their footsteps or copy their disgusting behavior — no, as if that weren't bad enough, you became more corrupt than both of them in everything you did.

verses.kjv: As I live, saith the Lord GOD, Sodom thy sister hath not done, she nor her daughters, as thou hast done, thou and thy daughters.
verses.web: As I live,” says the Lord LORD, “Sodom your sister has not done, she nor her daughters, as you have done, you and your daughters.
verses.ct: As surely as I live," declares the Lord GOD, "your sister Sodom and her towns never did what you and your towns have done.

verses.kjv: Behold, this was the iniquity of thy sister Sodom, pride, fulness of bread, and abundance of idleness was in her and in her daughters, neither did she strengthen the hand of the poor and needy.
verses.web: “ ‘ “Behold, this was the iniquity of your sister Sodom: pride, fullness of bread, and prosperous ease was in her and in her daughters. She also didn’t strengthen the hand of the poor and needy.
verses.ct: Here was the sin of your sister Sodom: she and her towns were arrogant, overfed, and complacent. They never helped the poor and needy.

verses.kjv: And they were haughty, and committed abomination before me: therefore I took them away as I saw good.
verses.web: They were arrogant, and committed abomination before me. Therefore I took them away when I saw it.
verses.ct: They were proud and committed disgusting sins right in front of me. So I swept them away when I saw what they had become.

verses.kjv: Neither hath Samaria committed half of thy sins; but thou hast multiplied thine abominations more than they, and hast justified thy sisters in all thine abominations which thou hast done.
verses.web: Samaria hasn’t committed half of your sins; but you have multiplied your abominations more than they, and have justified your sisters by all your abominations which you have done.
verses.ct: Samaria didn't commit even half the sins you have. You have piled up far more disgusting acts than either of them. By comparison, you've made your sisters look righteous.

verses.kjv: Thou also, which hast judged thy sisters, bear thine own shame for thy sins that thou hast committed more abominable than they: they are more righteous than thou: yea, be thou confounded also, and bear thy shame, in that thou hast justified thy sisters.
verses.web: You also bear your own shame yourself, in that you have given judgment for your sisters; through your sins that you have committed more abominable than they, they are more righteous than you. Yes, be also confounded, and bear your shame, in that you have justified your sisters.
verses.ct: You who passed judgment on your sisters — now carry your own disgrace! Your sins are so much worse than theirs that they look righteous next to you. So be ashamed and bear your humiliation, because you've made your sisters look innocent by comparison.

verses.kjv: When I shall bring again their captivity, the captivity of Sodom and her daughters, and the captivity of Samaria and her daughters, then will I bring again the captivity of thy captives in the midst of them:
verses.web: “ ‘ “I will reverse their captivity, the captivity of Sodom and her daughters, and the captivity of Samaria and her daughters, and the captivity of your captives among them;
verses.ct: But I will restore the fortunes of Sodom and her towns, and the fortunes of Samaria and her towns, and along with them I will restore your fortunes too.

verses.kjv: That thou mayest bear thine own shame, and mayest be confounded in all that thou hast done, in that thou art a comfort unto them.
verses.web: that you may bear your own shame, and may be ashamed because of all that you have done, in that you are a comfort to them.
verses.ct: This way you will carry your own shame and be humiliated by everything you've done — since your punishment actually brings them comfort.

verses.kjv: When thy sisters, Sodom and her daughters, shall return to their former estate, and Samaria and her daughters shall return to their former estate, then thou and thy daughters shall return to your former estate.
verses.web: Your sisters, Sodom and her daughters, will return to their former estate; and Samaria and her daughters will return to their former estate; and you and your daughters will return to your former estate.
verses.ct: Your sisters, Sodom and her towns, will be restored to what they once were. Samaria and her towns will be restored to what they once were. And you and your towns will also be restored to what you once were.

verses.kjv: For thy sister Sodom was not mentioned by thy mouth in the day of thy pride,
verses.web: For your sister Sodom was not mentioned by your mouth in the day of your pride,
verses.ct: You wouldn't even mention your sister Sodom's name back in the days when you were proud,

verses.kjv: Before thy wickedness was discovered, as at the time of thy reproach of the daughters of Syria, and all that are round about her, the daughters of the Philistines, which despise thee round about.
verses.web: before your wickedness was uncovered, as at the time of the reproach of the daughters of Syria, and of all who are around her, the daughters of the Philistines, who despise you all around.
verses.ct: before your own wickedness was exposed. Now you are the one being mocked by the towns of Aram and everyone around them, and by the Philistine towns — all of them looking down on you from every side.

verses.kjv: Thou hast borne thy lewdness and thine abominations, saith the LORD.
verses.web: You have borne your lewdness and your abominations,” says LORD.
verses.ct: You must bear the consequences of your lewdness and your disgusting sins," declares the LORD.

verses.kjv: For thus saith the Lord GOD; I will even deal with thee as thou hast done, which hast despised the oath in breaking the covenant.
verses.web: “ ‘For the Lord LORD says: “I will also deal with you as you have done, who have despised the oath in breaking the covenant.
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: "I will deal with you exactly as you deserve, because you treated the oath with contempt and broke the covenant.

verses.kjv: Nevertheless I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.
verses.web: Nevertheless I will remember my covenant with you in the days of your youth, and I will establish to you an everlasting covenant.
verses.ct: But I will remember the covenant I made with you in the days of your youth, and I will establish an everlasting covenant with you.

verses.kjv: Then thou shalt remember thy ways, and be ashamed, when thou shalt receive thy sisters, thine elder and thy younger: and I will give them unto thee for daughters, but not by thy covenant.
verses.web: Then you will remember your ways and be ashamed, when you receive your sisters, your elder sisters and your younger; and I will give them to you for daughters, but not by your covenant.
verses.ct: Then you will remember your past behavior and be ashamed when you receive your sisters — both the older and the younger. I will give them to you as daughters, but not because of your covenant.

verses.kjv: And I will establish my covenant with thee; and thou shalt know that I am the LORD:
verses.web: I will establish my covenant with you. Then you will know that I am LORD;
verses.ct: I will establish my covenant with you, and you will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: That thou mayest remember, and be confounded, and never open thy mouth any more because of thy shame, when I am pacified toward thee for all that thou hast done, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: that you may remember, and be confounded, and never open your mouth any more, because of your shame, when I have forgiven you all that you have done,” says the Lord LORD.’ ”
verses.ct: Then you will remember everything and be so deeply ashamed that you will never open your mouth to boast again — because I will have forgiven you for all that you have done," declares the Lord GOD."
